headline.main: A Stadium Section Where the Field View Hardly Matters

docs.snippet: The Jacksonville Jaguars’ new fantasy football lounge is an example of the leaguewide effort to keep the people buying tickets instead of staying home, with their recliners and WiFi connections....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Jacksonville Jaguars’ new fantasy football lounge is an example of the leaguewide effort to keep the people buying tickets instead of staying home, with their recliners and WiFi connections.
docs.abstract: Jacksonville Jaguars' new 7,000-square-foot fantasy football lounge at EverBank Field allows fans to follow games being played in cities across the country on high-definition television screens; lounge is an example of leaguewide effort to entice people to keep buying tickets to arenas instead of staying home.
